[general]
geo_location_checker = http://ip-api.com/json/?, https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KOP-XIAO/QuantumultX/master/Scripts/IP_API.js
resource_parser_url = https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KOP-XIAO/QuantumultX/master/Scripts/resource-parser.js

[dns]
no-system
no-ipv6
server = 1.1.1.1
server = 1.0.0.1
server = 8.8.8.8
server = 8.8.4.4

[policy]
static = Facebook, direct, Proxy server, img-url = https://github.com/Koolson/Qure/raw/master/IconSet/Facebook.png
static = Youtube, direct, Proxy server, img-url = https://github.com/Koolson/Qure/raw/master/IconSet/YouTube.png

static = Pornhub, direct, Proxy server, img-url = https://github.com/Koolson/Qure/raw/master/IconSet/Pornhub.png
static = Speedtest, direct, Proxy server, img-url = https://github.com/Koolson/Qure/raw/master/IconSet/Speedtest.png

static = AppStore, direct, Proxy server, img-url = https://github.com/Orz-3/mini/raw/master/appstore.png
static = Advertising , direct, reject, img-url = https://github.com/Koolson/Qure/raw/master/IconSet/Advertising.png

static = Fake iAP Policy, Fake iAP Server, direct, img-url = https://github.com/Koolson/Qure/raw/master/IconSet/Quantumult_X.png
static = Fake PXX Policy, direct, Fake iAP Policy, img-url = https://github.com/Koolson/Qure/raw/master/IconSet/Apple.png

static = v2ray, resource-tag-regex = V2Ray, img-url = https://github.com/Koolson/Qure/raw/master/IconSet/Azure.png
static = Proxy server, direct, v2ray, img-url = https://github.com/Koolson/Qure/raw/master/IconSet/Bypass.png

[server_local]
[server_remote]
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/phd91105/Scripts/master/QuanX/iap-server.txt, tag = Fake iAP Server
https://api.ikuuu.science/link/N59y7O4ipFg2l26N?sub=3&extend=1, opt-parser = true, tag = V2Ray Proxy

[rewrite_local]
[rewrite_remote]
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/phd91105/Scripts/master/QuanX/script.txt, tag = Scripts
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/phd91105/Scripts/master/QuanX/rewrite.txt, tag = Rewrite
https://github.com/langkhach270389/Quantumult-X-LK/raw/master/Rewrite/Fake_Vip_Remote.txt, tag = Fake_Remote_LangKhach, enabled = false
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chavyleung/scripts/master/QuantumultX.box.remote.conf, tag = BoxJS

[filter_local]
final, direct
[filter_remote]
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/phd91105/Scripts/master/QuanX/iap-filter.txt, tag = Fake iAP Filter, force-policy = Fake iAP Policy, enabled = true

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigdargon/hostsVN/master/option/hostsVN-quantumult-rule.conf, tag = hostsVN, force-policy = Advertising, enabled = true
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/phd91105/Scripts/master/QuanX/rules/Facebook.list, tag = Facebook, force-policy = Facebook, enabled = true
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/phd91105/Scripts/master/QuanX/rules/Pornhub.list, tag = Pornhub, force-policy = Pornhub, enabled = true
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/phd91105/Scripts/master/QuanX/rules/Speedtest.list, tag = Speedtest, force-policy =  Speedtest, enabled = true
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/phd91105/Scripts/master/QuanX/rules/YouTube.list, tag = Youtube, force-policy = Youtube, enabled = true
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/phd91105/Scripts/master/QuanX/rules/AppStore.list, tag = AppStore, force-policy = AppStore, enabled = false
